alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 27 at 10:25AM CDT until August 28 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Wolf River Above Gulfport affecting Harrison County. For the Wolf River...including Gulfport...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wolf River Above Gulfport. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Bells Ferry Road will begin to flood. There will be water over the access road just upstream of the bridge and the road will become impassable very quickly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.2 feet on 10/28/2002. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
